variables.name: DONE
variables.comment: * Indicator that we have reached the ends of the UTF16 text.

methods.name: public int next()
methods.comment:
* Returns the UTF16 code unit at index, and increments to the next
     * code unit (post-increment semantics).  If index is out of
     * range, DONE is returned, and the iterator is reset to the limit
     * of the text.
     * @return the next UTF16 code unit, or DONE if the index is at the limit
     *         of the text.

methods.name: public int nextCodePoint()
methods.comment: * Returns the code point at index, and increments to the next code * point (post-increment semantics). If index does not point to a * valid surrogate pair, the behavior is the same as * next(). Otherwise the iterator is incremented past * the surrogate pair, and the code point represented by the pair * is returned. * @return the next codepoint in text, or DONE if the index is at * the limit of the text.
